column1: * [[Gandalf]] visits [[Bag End]] but [[Bilbo Baggins]] is missing. He talks with [[Holman Greenhand]] and realises Bilbo is the right person for the [[Quest for Erebor]].<ref>{{UT
* Bilbo meets [[Sméagol]]/[[Gollum]] and finds [[the One Ring]].<ref name="TA"/>
* [[Saruman]] agrees to an [[Attack on Dol Guldur]], since he now wishes to prevent [[Sauron]] from searching the [[Anduin]].<ref name="TA"/>
* [[Sauron]] having made his plans abandons [[Dol Guldur]].<ref name="TA"/>
* The [[Battle of Five Armies]] in [[Dale]].<ref name="TA"/>

column2: Dáin II Ironfoot]] of the [[Iron Hills]] becomes [[King under the Mountain]].<ref name="TA"/>
Tolman Cotton]], first child and son of [[Holman Cotton]].<ref>{{App

*[http://lalaith.vpsurf.de/Tolkien/2941.html A daily calendar of 2941 TA] by [[Andreas Moehn]]
